channel.title: matlab on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in matlab on Savo's Site

item.title: Mazebot
item.description: Design and programmed a rover to autonomously navigate a maze and retrieve a block

item.title: Crane Gantry Control System
item.description: Made a simulated control system for a gantry crane system

item.title: Arterial Guidewire Simulation (Capstone)
item.description: Developed a tool to determine the approximate wear on the insides of blood vessels as a guide wire is fed through them.

item.title: Mountain Bike Suspension
item.description: Developed a kinematic model in MATLAB to perform a design optimization of a mountain bike suspension system.
